content.question: Suppose that in 2017 government outlays exceeded tax revenues. An increase in government purchases in 2018, with no other budgetary changes, would lead to which of the following from 2017 to 2018 ?

choices.label: An increase in the government budget surplus
A decrease in the government budget surplus
An increase in the government budget deficit
A decrease in the government budget deficit
A decrease in the national debt

content.answer: An increase in the government budget deficit

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
